title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: When deleting items in the Coolbar, the layout becomes corrupted. This issue is observed in Build 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, the Launch item is moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
EB: After pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row should be deleted and the Launch item should remain on the second row.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow the steps below:

1. Run the attached test case.
2. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row (last coolItem).
3. Drag the Launch coolitem (last coolItem on the first row) to the second row, placing it after the Open Type item.
4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Launch coolitem.
5. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row (last coolItem on the first row), placing it after the Search coolitem.
6. Press the Delete button.

Expected behavior:
- The first item on the second row should be deleted.
- The layout of the Coolbar should not be corrupted; the second row should remain in place.
